com.fluidops.fedx.algebra
Interface QueryRef

All Known Subinterfaces:
StatementTupleExpr
All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckStatementPattern, EmptyNJoin, EmptyNUnion, ExclusiveGroup, ExclusiveStatement, FedXStatementPattern, IndependentJoinGroup, NJoin, NTuple, NUnion, SingleSourceQuery, StatementSourcePattern
public interface QueryRef

Interface to access the QueryInfo from all FedX Algebra nodes. All FedX Algebra nodes should implement this interface.

Author:
Andreas Schwarte

Method Summary
 QueryInfo getQueryInfo()
          Retrieve the attached query information of the tuple expression
